divs: Sighting DetailsAt around 1:30 am I was getting ready to go back in the house when I saw a bank of round lights moving quickley. Their were vertical lines of light along the side of it. At the front of the vertical lines was one green line.All the lights appeared to be a pale red color I activated my cell phone camera and quickly took one photo before it was behind the trees by my house.It was when I printed the photo on my computer and blew up the picture that you can see the round bank of lights illuminating a triangle shaped object that the lights seem to be underneath. I am sending a copy of this photo. This object appeared very quickly in the sky while I was feeding my cats. I have never seen anything like this in the sky before.
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Reading
There were no other sightings in Reading on or around June 4th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Round bank of lights under a triangle shaped object
